name: librext
description: GSI's UI design system and component library

scripts.build: npm run build-spec && npm run build-code
scripts.build-spec: npm run build:librext-ui-spec && npm run build:librext-spec-builder
scripts.build-code: npm run build:librext-css-builder && npm run build:librext-md-builder && npm run build:librext-docs-builder

author: RJ Salvador <salvador.workshop@gmail.com>
